-MEmjOLZj0hmKmehFxrb.author: Conficius
-MEmjOLZj0hmKmehFxrb.text: Choose a job you love and you'll never have to work a day in your life

-MEmjYjnEVWMCOPunsvu.author: Abraham Lincoln
-MEmjYjnEVWMCOPunsvu.text: At the end, it is not years in your life that count, but the life in your years

-MEmjyhyRKr0TTwVZyD1.author: Albert Einstein
-MEmjyhyRKr0TTwVZyD1.text: Logic will get you form A to Z, imagination will get you everywhere
